title: I want a zero tolerance policy and disconnects
body:
Yes I know it happens sometimes and its beyond our control.  Internet goes out, computer crashes, emergency in real life.

I mean, how come some of us can play for years and hardly ever DC? Are we just better at deciding when to play? Are we not kids whos parents make them stop playing and come to dinner?

I propose that 3 disconnects in ranked play equal a lifetime ban of ranked play until they play x amount of matches in a row in normal without any disconnects.

Not for situations where someone disconnects and then comes back after they restart their computer, I'm talking about someone who leaves and never comes back.

I'm tired of paying the price. If you can't figure out how to manage your time so you can be able to finish a ranked match that you start, you have no business playing ranked and should be purged out of it.
